term.title: dividing surface

item.text: A surface, usually taken to be a hyperplane, constructed at right angles to the minimum-energy path on a potential-energy surface. In conventional transition-state theory it passes through the highest point on the minimum-energy path. In generalized versions of transition-state theory the dividing surface can be at other positions; in variational transition-state theory the position of the dividing surface is varied so as to get a better estimate of the rate constant.
